content: Puzzle #24 requires bifurcation and the final hint (to do that part) is incorrect.

Really tough puzzles. There's some really neat logic and it can be fun. But when I get stuck, the hints aren't always very helpful. Sometimes they can be rather cryptic (see what I did there?) and I have no idea how they came to the conclusion they did. They also tend to use run on sentences which can make it harder to understand, and I'm a native English speaker. With the puzzles being so difficult and hints not very helpful sometimes, -1 star. Still a good app.

Some of the hints are wrong or very hard to understand. In particular #22 Hint 1...doesnt seem to make sense to me. Still no idea why all the puzzles aren't in app rather than several. Each type could be an expansion pack then. Agree with other reviewers... Balance between fun and difficulty is not quite there. All puzzles should be open from start... Found some that were mega difficult early on and some that were far easier later.

This app fails in the balance of fun and difficult, to go further, the Phistomefel puzzles are not fun. Because you have to unlock puzzles, there are points where you're stuck with a couple puzzles that feel like the setter is just trying to prove how much better at sudoku they are than you. Eventually I'll just start jamming in random numbers until the cell indicates it's correct, and finish the puzzle that way, just so I can hopefully move on to a fun one.
It is a great game. I am confused however. On the second puzzle after completion I have the option to still continue it and there is a flag next to the stars?
Love it. Very hard to get my mind into the killer cage logic though.
Good game, but the hints use so many terms that are never explained that the hints make things even more confusing. Absolutely horrible hints.
After getting my head into these puzzles they are extremely hard, but achievable without using the hints.
This get extremely difficult from the start. Much more so than the other CtC apps

Love this game. Love the youtube channel - Cracking the Cryptic. It works very well and very intuitive. The hints are a godsend. Just a note though, in the dark themes, when I highlight a cell with a color it becomes near impossible to read the numbers in that cell.

I just completed one puzzle and my major complaint is how small the text is for the killer cage sums. I wish there was a setting to toggle that text size. I know you can click on the cage to see the amount, but it's hard to look at the puzzle as a whole on a phone screen. Besides that, love it!
Very hard, but that's probably why you're here anyways.

This one is way harder then the others (and several of the tips have mistakes in them), I also found a lot of the pussel to be really boring (some are really good on the other hand) and not to the standards of previous titles... Sadly you're forced to play the bad puzzles to continue... Killer Sudoku is my favorite sudoku variant so really disappointing in this app....
Amazingly challenging puzzles. Controls and gameplay are excellent. Really like the combination of pencil marks, and the built in maths
Much harder than the others. Start with miracle sudoku. But, it's incredible, and the puzzles are great.

If you are a CtC fan or a sudoku fan this app is perfect. Handcrafted puzzles that illustrate some beautiful ideas that have been on the channel. I will admit that these puzzles are probably the hardest ones yet mostly because I am horrible at mental mathenatics so much slower than the other apps in this regard. Nonetheless the puzzles are brilliant and full of genius logic.
Having a great time working through these just as I did with the classics! The L Tetrominoes puzzle (#12) was particularly delightful, the break in had me giggling ^_^

Absolutely amazing hand-crafted killer sudokus by truly talented constructors. The only downside is that I don't think I can ever go back to computer-generated puzzles after this, so finding new quality sudoku might be harder...

Good puzzles let down by readability of the grid. While I don't doubt the quality of the puzzles, the readability of the grid is a much higher challenge for me. The size of the characters used for cage totals is too small for me to see clearly regardless of the brightness or colour scheme. The higher contrast schemes wash out the grid lines to make them invisible. Turning up the brightness of the screen helps somewhat but that causes eye strain which means I can only play for a few minutes

Warning: The puzzles in this collection are difficult! Puzzle 24 was the first one over two stars that I could solve without using the hints (and I'm not a beginner - I've actually had a puzzle I authored that was featured on the CTC YouTube channel). The chess, sandwich and thermo apps (and even miracle sudoku) were much more 'approachable' for the general audience. Not everyone in the world is at Mark and Simon's solving level, and I think a lot of people will be frustrated with this app.
Beautiful collection of puzzles as always.

Brilliant puzzles but incredibly difficult. Would have appreciated an easier start and then ramp up to the tricky ones. Some hints are inscrutable too like the second hint of the first Phistomefel puzzle. Can't see why that cell is minimum 6/7.
Clean interface, great hints if needed, fiendish puzzles and a great sudoku app. I love the fact I paid for it and can enjoy it, with no in app purchases or adverts. Well worth the price.
Some of the most clever and intuitive puzzles I've ever worked through. The Cracking the Cryptic team have delivered a delight in this collection.
Love all the games CTC games, kindled a love for sudoku
Same great interface and as expected a brilliant collection of puzzles from some of the world's best Sudoku setters.

This is another absolutely superb app from Cracking The Cryptic. I'd only ever done the computer generated puzzles found in newspapers, which I found quite boring. These hand crafted puzzles are a delight to do and require a bit more out of the box thinking to complete, but are still quite approachable.
Yet another great collection of sudoku puzzles and the best solving interface of any sudoku app on android
just found out the app is out, made my day üòÖ
Best CTC app yet. Love the author attributions for these brilliant puzzles. Thank you too for allowing simultaneous corner and center marks.
Another instant favorite from CTC. Excellent puzzles!
Great interface with fantastic puzzles.
Waited for ages for this to be available. Not disappointed.
The boys are back! The best suduko puzzles on the play store. Amazing stuff as always
Do you like to Crack The Cryptic? Do you want high quality, hand crafted puzzles with a great interface? If so, this is the Killer Sudoku app for you!
Great as always from these folks üëè
